itemDescription: Emeritus Professor of Plant Sciences at the University of Oxford

wikipedia_page.main: Christopher John Leaver  (born 31 May 1942) is an Emeritus Professorial Fellow of St John's College, Oxford who served as Sibthorpian Professor in the Department of Plant Sciences at the University of Oxford from 1990 to 2007.
